## Data Removal Notice

The data previously published in this repository has been **removed due to data quality issues**.

### Reason for Removal

During quality assurance reviews, we identified significant issues with the data extraction and processing methods used to compile the ETH ORD program metadata. To maintain scientific integrity and ensure accuracy, we have decided to retract the published dataset.

### Current Status

The project team is actively revising the work and updating the methods to ensure the data extraction process is sound and reliable.

### Timeline

**An updated version of this dataset is expected to be available from July 2026.**

### Contact

For questions or more information about this dataset:

- **Organization:** Global Health Engineering, ETH Zurich
- **Repository:** [https://github.com/Global-Health-Engineering/ethord](https://github.com/Global-Health-Engineering/ethord)
- **Issues:** [Report an issue](https://github.com/Global-Health-Engineering/ethord/issues)

### Archive Access

The deprecated version of this repository has been archived for internal reference. If you require access to the previous version for a specific reason, please contact the maintainers.
